title: OpenAI Just Bought a Game Studio—But Why?
description: The ChatGPT creator acquired Global Illumination for an undisclosed amount.

title: Polkadot ($DOT), Kusama ($KSM), and Cardano ($ADA) Lead the Crypto Development Race, Data Shows
description: The “blockchain of blockchains” Polkadot ($DOT) is currently the leading cryptocurrency network by development activity, and it’s followed by Kusama ($KSM), a public pre-production environment for it, and by smart contract platform Cardano ($ADA). That’s according to data from on-chain analytics firm Santiment, Polkadot has managed to maintain its position as the leading cryptocurrency in […]

title: Is MetaMask on the Way to Becoming the Google of the Web3 Industry?
description: In the crypto market, tools that offer simplicity, security, and adaptability rise quickly in importance. One such tool, the MetaMask wallet, has garnered massive attention from users and developers alike, and for good reason. Given its popularity and widespread adoption, an interesting question arises: Is MetaMask on its way to becoming the Google of the ... Read more
